summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of SOVEH B2B retail app completed. All major fixes verified: AI recommendations show formatted text (not JSON), input text boxes have white backgrounds, shop navigation works with categories, Google Maps integration present, and push notifications enabled. Authentication flow and core functionality working properly.
passed_tests: AI Recommendations display formatted text instead of JSON (bullet points with product suggestions)
Input text boxes have proper white background (phone, OTP, search inputs all rgb(255,255,255))
Shop tab navigation works with 4 categories and product loading
Account menu navigation works (3 menu items: Edit Profile, Manage Addresses, Credit)
Authentication flow works with test OTP system
Push notifications initialized on app load
Main dashboard loads with proper navigation tabs
Category selection in shop loads products correctly
Search input styling and functionality present

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor testing limitations due to no sample orders for live tracking demo)
